name: Escape the Quack
storyline:
The objective is simple: Find the exit and solve puzzles along the way while staying ahead of the duck.

In this whimsical low-poly adventure, players must evade the relentless pursuit of a quirky duck. Each level presents a unique task that players must complete while avoiding capture. Designed for players of all ages, this game combines humor and lightheartedness with thrilling gameplay. The premise of being chased by a duck adds a fun twist, making it suitable for families and casual gamers alike.

Players will encounter various challenges, such as puzzles to solve, items to collect, and obstacles to navigate. Quick thinking and strategic planning are essential as players balance escaping the duck and completing their objectives.

As players advance, they face increasing difficulty levels, making the gameplay more exciting. The duck becomes more cunning, requiring players to adapt their strategies and improve their skills to survive.

Get ready to race against the clock, complete your tasks, and outsmart the duck in this captivating low-poly world!
summary: Get ready to race in this exciting platformer against the clock, complete your tasks, and outsmart the duck in this captivating low-poly world! Compete against friends and the world with an online leaderboard.
